results.title: Metformin ameliorated methotrexate-induced hepatorenal toxicity in rats in addition to its antitumor activity: two birds with one stone
results.text_hl: Previous studies revealed the protective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@GENE_MET @GENE_24553 @@@MET@@@) on @<m>DISEASE_Hepatorenal_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006530 @@@hepatorenal toxicity@@@ in other models in addition to its anticancer effects.
